name: Camilla Visual Novel
description:
This is a visual novel featuring one of my original characters named Camilla Rose. In this story you play as a male and are a fan of her, you watch a live performance she did and get the opportunity to chat with her after the show. You get to choose what to say and get a hand in how the story may go. In this you will learn alot about her, and get to have have fun with  her, or fail and wind up with a bad end. There is 23 different endings, some good, bad and some just neutral. Will you be able to reach all 23 of these endings?

If you enjoyed this and want to see more of my work feel free to check out my twitter for art!  https://twitter.com/expodraws?s=21
